title: Best of The Herd: 09/23/2019
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 09/23/2019
description:
Colin says these early season struggles for the Browns were very predictable if you know football and how teams are built. He says one of the most impressive teams on Sunday was the Ravens and explains why. He explains where he was right and wrong over the weekend. Plus, Michael Vick tells Colin why Baker Mayfield is struggling so much and how the play-calling can help him.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
